original_title: ヌードモデルNTR 上司と羞恥に溺れた妻の衝撃的浮気映像 木下凛々子
overview: A few years after I got married to Ririko, I was unable to produce results at a publishing company, and a big job came to me. His boss, Mr. Oki, gave him the opportunity to work with the up-and-coming photographer, Gyokudo Otsuka, to create the perfect shot... or so it was supposed to be. However, on that day, contact with the female model is completely lost. No matter how many times I contact, I can't find a substitute model, Otsuka-sensei who is getting irritated, and I'm just flustered.
title: The Nude Model Cheats On Me. Shocking Footage Of The Acts Of Infidelity Between My Boss And My Wife, Who Got So Embarrassed. Ririko Kinoshita
